coffee.name: espresso
coffee.description: Espresso is a strong Italian coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground beans. It's concentrated and bold in flavor.
coffee.specialty: Crafting a perfect espresso involves precise water-to-coffee ratio, essential for balanced flavor extraction.

coffee.name: americano
coffee.description: Americano. A milder coffee drink made by diluting espresso with hot water, resulting in a lighter flavor profile.
coffee.specialty: Americano: A milder coffee achieved by adding hot water to espresso, creating a lighter flavor compared to a long black. Unlike a long black, where water is added first, an Americano maintains the espresso's aroma and crema.

coffee.name: longBlack
coffee.description: Long black. An espresso-based coffee where hot water is poured over double shots, offering a bold flavor with crema preservation.
coffee.specialty: Long black: Created by pouring hot water over espresso shots, yielding a robust flavor while maintaining crema. Unlike an Americano, water is added after the espresso, preserving aroma and strength.

coffee.name: coldBrew
coffee.description: Cold brew. Coffee brewed with cold water over an extended period, resulting in a smooth, less acidic flavor perfect for iced beverages.
coffee.specialty: Cold brew: Brewed using cold water over hours, it offers a smooth, less acidic taste with subtle sweetness. Ideal for refreshing iced drinks, it's known for its bold yet mellow flavor profile.

coffee.name: latte
coffee.description: Latte: Espresso combined with steamed milk, resulting in a creamy, balanced coffee drink known for its smoothness and versatility.
coffee.specialty: Latte: A classic coffee choice, crafted by blending espresso with steamed milk for a creamy texture. Its balanced flavor profile makes it ideal for both coffee purists and those who enjoy a milder taste.

coffee.name: flatWhite
coffee.description: Creamy blend of espresso and microfoam â€“ the indulgent Flat White.
coffee.specialty: The Flat White melds rich espresso and velvety microfoam, resulting in a balanced, smooth coffee with a bold kick.

coffee.name: cappuccino
coffee.description: Classic combo: espresso, steamed milk, foam in Cappuccino delight.
coffee.specialty: Layers of espresso, steamed milk, and foam harmonize in a Cappuccino, delivering a robust flavor with a creamy texture.

coffee.name: mocha
coffee.description: Mocha. espresso meets rich chocolate for a divine treat.
coffee.specialty: Indulge in the Mocha's blend of espresso and cocoa, creating a luxurious taste profile that combines the best of coffee and chocolate.

coffee.name: macchiato
coffee.description: Bold espresso with a milk stain: the distinct Macchiato.
coffee.specialty: With a touch of milk, Macchiato offers a strong espresso taste balanced by a subtle creaminess, making it a true espresso lover's choice.

coffee.name: chai
coffee.description: Warm spices and tea unite in the aromatic Chai Latte.
coffee.specialty: Chai Latte blends spiced tea and steamed milk for a cozy and aromatic drink, perfect for enjoying the comforting flavors of spices and warmth

coffee.name: turmeric
coffee.description: Turmeric Latte. a blend of turmeric, milk, and spice.
coffee.specialty: Experience the Turmeric Latte's vibrant hue and unique flavor as turmeric, milk, and spices come together to offer a cozy, earthy taste.

coffee.name: icedCoffee
coffee.description: Iced Coffee. a refreshing blend of espresso, milk, and vanilla ice cream.
coffee.specialty: Iced Coffee, popular in Australia, features double shot espresso, milk, and a scoop of vanilla ice cream over ice, offering a creamy and invigorating coffee experience.

coffee.name: affogato
coffee.description: Affogato. espresso meets ice cream for a divine pairing
coffee.specialty: Affogato's simple elegance shines as espresso meets creamy ice cream, creating a harmonious blend of hot and cold, bitter and sweet.
